Changelog for django-pycorpkit
==============================

1.0.0 [17-10-2024]
--------------------

Features:

- add modules(accounts, common and organisation)


1.0.1 [30-10-2024]
--------------------

Features:

- add support for login by phone
- Add indexes on user and contact models


1.0.2 [31-10-2024]
--------------------

Features:

- Make default roles configurable
